Docs.summary: Provides methods for creating class factories.

Docs.summary: Creates a class factory for a type in the specified assembly.
Docs.returns: An object that represents the class factory.

MemberSignature.Usage: iHostEx.GetSecuredClassFactory (dwIdentityFlags, dwZone, lpSite, pbSecurityId, lpHash, className, fileName)

Docs.param:
One of the following CORIESECURITY values:
- CORIESECURITY_ZONE: 0x01
- CORIESECURITY_SITE: 0x02

One of the following URLZONE values:
- URLZONE_LOCAL_MACHINE: 0x00
- URLZONE_INTRANET: 0x01
- URLZONE_TRUSTED: 0x02
- URLZONE_INTERNET: 0x03
- URLZONE_UNTRUSTED: 0x04
A unique ID for the site.
The hexadecimal encoded hash value of the assembly that is being loaded.
Docs.summary: Creates a secure class factory for a type in the specified assembly.
Docs.returns: An object that represents the secure class factory.
